#### <s class="topic-title">[[Eustress]]</s>

Moderate or normal [[Psychology|psychological]] stress interpreted as being beneficial for the experiencer.

**See**:: [[Flow State]], [[stress]],
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
